subject: Earthquake hit Chile

Good Morning All
   
  Maybe they were not that far off afterall...A magnitude 7.7 earthquake hit Chile today.  Wasn't the warning for the 12th and hitting China.  Who knows, mere coincidence maybe!!!!
   
  Lynn Burton
